TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IRandomAccessContainer`1<TValue>

Docs.summary: Interface for a container that supports random access iteration. Containers that implement random access iteration support the following operations: moving forward one position by calling operator++, moving backward one position by calling operator--, accessing an element by using operator[], and accessing an element by using pointer arithmetic.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !TValue at_bias(int32 A_0) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the element at the current bias of the container. The bias is the offset from the current element zero.
Docs.returns: The element at the given bias.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool valid_bias(int32 A_0) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines if a given bias is valid for the container. The bias is the offset from the current element zero.
Docs.returns: if the given bias is valid for the container; otherwise, .
